146639.「ふむふむ……。\n 今 <pc>さんには\n 調査を お願いしていませんでした:
Mmm-hmm... Now. I haven't asked you to investigate... First of all, please choose which area you'd like to start investigating demons from the
"Receive Investigation Request" menu!

147082.「調査内容を 変更しないのですね。\n わかりましたっ！<br>\n「今の調査状:
I'm not changing my mind about the investigation... Understood! You can check the current status of the survey from the
Territorial Survey Binder in the Important Items, so please come back when the survey is complete!

147083.「わかりました……。\n <pc>さんも お忙しいでしょうし\n こればっかりは:
I understand... You must be pretty busy yourself, then...
But! If you just so happen to change your mind and feel like investigating some monsters, you're always welcome to come back!

147086.「まあっ 調査内容を変更したいのですねっ！\n 変更しちゃうと 今の調査は中止と:
Well now! So you'd like to change the area you're investigating? Your current survey's progress will be reset to 0 if you do that.
That being said, are you okay cancelling your current investigation and changing to a different one?

147089.<pipipi_on>\n「依頼中の魔物の調査状況は\n だいじなものにある 領:
You can check the progress of your current investigation by using the Realm Survey Binder in your Key Items.
When you've finished investigating the monsters in an area, come back and see me for a reward! Good luck!

147092.「ありがとうございますっ！\n 魔物の調査を 始めていただけるのですね。\n ま:
Thanks so much! To begin your investigation
on monsters, you'll have to first choose the
realm you want to investigate.
<break>

147093.「わかりましたっ！\n 調査内容を 変更しますね。それでは……\n 新たに調査を:
So you want to change, got it! Now...can you
please choose the new realm you'd like to
investigate?
<break>

Anything else I can do for you?
<break>

here... Can I help you with anything?<break>

<pc> The request you're currently investigating is
here... Is there anything else I can help you
with?<break>

Please choose the area you'd like to
investigate.
<break>

147103.「……あらっ？ <%sM_stage>は\n 今 調査中の地域です。調査内容を変:
... What? <%sM_stage> is the location we're investigating... If you'd like to change your mind, you'll have to pick a different
region...

147104.「……あらっ？ <%sM_stage>は\n すでに 調査が完了していますね。<:
... What? <%sM_stage> has already completed its investigation... I've been asked by HQ to average out the demon surveys... I'm sorry,
but you'll have to choose from the areas that haven't been completed...

147105.「ふむふむ……今回の魔物調査は\n <%sM_ryoukai>の <%sM_st:
Mm-hmm... This demon survey is for
<%sM_ryoukai>'s <%sM_stage>... Then may we
begin the investigation?<yesno 2><close>

147150.「調査には いくつかルールがあります。\n まず 魔物調査は 一度につき\n ひ:
There are a few rules to investigating... First, you can only investigate one area at a time. If you wish to survey another region,
you must speak to me and select "Change Survey" or complete your current survey... Also, once an area has been surveyed, it
cannot be resurveyed until all areas within the same territory have been surveyed... I've said a lot of things like that, but I think
you'll soon understand if you try it, so just take it easy and choose!

147151.「<pc>さんが 進行中の調査をやめて\n 他の地域の 調査をしたくなったら 私:
If you decide you want to stop your ongoing research and do research in another area, you can talk to me and select "Change
Research"... However... If you change the research area, the current research will be canceled and the number of demons killed will
return to zero... If you still want, you can change the survey at any time... Please note that the information of the completed area
won't disappear even if you change the survey... ... However, it is up to you to decide which areas you wish to survey. I'll put your feelings first! So if you want to change your mind, please feel free to ask me...

147152.「魔物の調査……指定の魔物を\n すべて倒し終わったら 領界調査バインダーを\n:
Demonology... When you've defeated all the demons you've been assigned, please bring the Realm Research Binder to me... After
confirming the contents, send the information to the headquarters for completion... Rewards will be given out for each area surveyed...
The rewards will be in the form of experience and gold, so it's best to report with the profession you wish to receive... Of course,
you can also receive training stamps instead of experience, so please think carefully before you come... What's more! When you've
completed your survey of the entire area within the same realm... Hey... What! In addition to the rewards for each region, I
will also give you a special reward! That's the goal! Complete the entire area survey... Even after you've completed the survey,
you'll be rewarded again and again... You can find out what you'll get by talking to me, or if you're in the middle of an order, you can
check the important stuff, so please do your best!

147153.「魔物の調査を始めるには 私に話して\n 『調査依頼を受ける』を選んでください。:
To start a demon survey, talk to me and select "Take Survey"... The investigation will be done region by region. Please choose one area that you'd like to investigate and tell me... I'll take care of the details. All you have to do is defeat the designated number of demons. When you've defeated all of the designated demons, come to me... I'll
check the territory survey binder and send the information to HQ, and the survey will be complete! We'll give you your reward then...

147154.「魔物の調査……指定の魔物を\n すべて倒し終わったら 領界調査バインダーを\n:
Demonology... When you've defeated all the demons you've been assigned, please bring the Realm Research Binder to me... After
confirming the contents, send the information to the headquarters for completion... Rewards will be given out for each area surveyed...
The rewards will be in the form of experience and gold, so it's best to report with the profession you wish to receive... Of course,
you can also receive training stamps instead of experience, so please think carefully before you come... What's more! When you've
completed your survey of the entire area within the same realm... Hey... What! In addition to the rewards for each region, I
will also give you a special reward! That's the goal! Complete the entire area survey... Even after you've completed the survey,
you'll be rewarded again and again... You can find out what you'll get by talking to me, or if you're in the middle of an order, you can
check the important stuff, so please do your best!

147155.「何について 説明しましょうか？\n<break>: What would you like me to explain?<break>

I'm not sure... I'm sorry... So! In that case... I think it would be best for you to proceed with your own adventure, sir! I apologize for the inconvenience, but if there are more
territories to investigate, I'll let you know when you come to me...

204372.「調律には いくつかルールがある。\n まず 調律は 一度につき\n ひとつの地:
There are some rules about tuning... First, you can only tune one area at a time. If you want to tune another region, you have to talk
to me and choose "Change tuning", or you have to complete the current tuning... And once a region has been tuned, it cannot be re-tuned
until all regions of the same period have been tuned... I know I've said a lot of things, but it's easy to see... I'm just
gonna take it easy.

204373.「君が 進行中の調律をやめて\n 他の地域の 調律をしたくなったら 私に話して\:
If you want to stop the tuning in progress and tune another area, you can talk to me and choose "change tuning"... But... If you
change the tuning area, the current tuning will be canceled and the number of demons killed will revert to zero. If you don't
mind, you can always change the tuning... The information of the tuned area will not disappear even if you change the tuned area,
so don't worry. ... However, it is up to you to decide which area you want to tune. The feeling of... So if you want to change your mind, feel free to ask me...

204375.「調律対象となる 時代だが\n 調律者である 君自身の冒険が 進むほどに\n 増:
It's a time of tuning, but as your own adventures as a tuner increase... Your perceptions will cause your tuning binders to
begin to correct the world's order... I apologize for the inconvenience, but if there are more eras to be attuned to, you will
report them to me when you come to me...

204376.「世界の調律を始めるには 私に話して\n 『調律依頼を受ける』を選んでほしい。\:
To start tuning the world, you need to talk to me and select "accept tuning request"... Because tuning is a regional process. If you'd like, you can choose one area to tune and I'll tell you... But all you have to do is defeat a certain number of demons, that's all. When you've defeated all the demons, come to me... I'll
check your tuning binder... I'll give you your reward...

204377.「魔物の調律……指定の魔物を\n すべて倒し終わったら 調律バインダーを\n 私:
Demon tuning... When you've defeated all the demons you've been assigned, bring your tuning binder to me... Once you've read it,
peel it off and tune... You'll be rewarded for each area you complete... The rewards can be experience or gold, so it's best to report
back with the profession you wish to receive... Of course, you can also receive training stamps instead of experience, so
think carefully before you report... In addition, when you've completed the tuning of all regions of the same era... I'll give you
a special reward in addition to the regional rewards. The goal is to complete the tuning of the entire era. And once you've completed
the period, you can always come back and tune again, and you'll be rewarded... You can find out what you'll get by talking to me, or if
you're in the middle of an order, you can check the important stuff, so good luck...

204378.「何について 説明しようか？\n<break>: What do you want me to explain?<break>
